name: Day of the Flame
description:
Day of the Flame

A mysterious flame drops into the sewers. Can it survive such a damp and rat infested place or will it inevitably draw its last breath of oxygen before quietly dimming out?

# Controls KeyboardGamepadMove ArrowsAnalog / D-pad JumpSpaceA, Cross, BShootCX, Square, Y

# Bugfixes

  • Fixed a bug that had the end boss at 2hp.

# Known issues

  • There's no ending after defeating the last boss.
  • It is possible to defeat the last boss, die and fight him again.
  • Water particles in Level 1 aren't spawning.
  • Crash when standing to close to a specific wall in the game.
